Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 14 years, Gasser Egli Brunner has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Gasser Egli Brunner launched his career as a Drilling Engineer at Swisspetro AG, where he gained valuable experience from 2011 to 2012.
